description: This file declares a utility class 'DelegateUtils' with static methods for serializing JSON variants to strings and acquiring direct link objects from a plugin host shell.

classes.name: DelegateUtils
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods for JSON serialization and acquiring direct link objects.

methods.name: void SerializeToJsonString(const Core::JSON::VariantContainer & container,std::string & outJson)
methods.description: Serializes a Core::JSON::VariantContainer to a JSON string.

methods.name: std::shared_ptr<WPEFramework::Utils::JSONRPCDirectLink> AcquireLink(PluginHost::IShell * shell,const char * callsign)
methods.description: Obtains a shared pointer to a JSONRPCDirectLink object for communication with a plugin, given the shell interface and callsign.

ctags.name: SerializeToJsonString
ctags.pattern: /^    static inline void SerializeToJsonString(const Core::JSON::VariantContainer& container,$/
